content.body: I’m sorry I missed it, and it doesn’t look like there are recorded notes. Isn’t one of the responsibilities of the secretary to create minutes (not notes) of the meetings?
re: no recorded notes -- the note folks were discouraged from (enabled to stop) taking notes so they could give their undivided attention to the subject at hand

content.body:
> <@mpcsh_:matrix.org> I felt like Istvan also overstepped with his _lengthy_ comments about stenography today

agree.  although the chair(s) do bear responsibility for keeping things moving. though I do understand the challenge there wrt it being the ecma secretary, especially when "do not interrupt me" was forcefully said after an attempt to rein in the polemic
